content:
Abner family

1 Simon Wolf ABNER                   1787 - 1831 #350 (Abba)
 + Henne                             1788 (Lebel)
       married Apr 2, 1805 Krakow
 + Golda                             1793 - 1841 #81 (Samuel)
  2o Chawa ABNER                     1810 - 1848 #137
    * Wolf LEMBERGER                 1794 - before 1836
        FAMILY LISTING
  2x Abram ABNER                     1813 #123
  2x Mark ABNER                      1814 - Sep 6, 1815 (p.10)
  2x Lazar Jakob ABNER               1819 #152 - Apr 13, 1877 #159
    + Hana FEIGENBAUM                1818-19 - 1847 #120
          married Feb 17, 1842 #6
     3x Simon Wolff ABNER            1842 #517 - 1845 #362

    + Feigel KINSKI                  1823 #81

     3o Gitla Rifka ABNER            Aug 16, 1850 #328
       * Leizer KAMSLER              1819 #422
           FAMILY LISTING

        4o Reizel [KAMSLER]          Apr 6, 1888 #409 - after 1940

     3o Golda ABNER                  Sep 7, 1854 #373
    ?? * Hirsch ABRAHAMER            1856 Zabawa
    ??  4x Jakob Leib ABRAHAMER      1886 Podgorze
    ??    + Ryfka ROSNER             Chrzanow
    ??          banns 1912 #311,  married Dec 29, 1912
    ??     5o Fryda ABRAHAMER        Feb 4, 1917 #39
    ??     5o Nina ABRAHAMER         May 16, 1921 Krakow
     3o Chane ABNER                  Jul 1, 1857 (1862 #245
       * Machel MELZER               1867 #30 Lwow
             banns 1892 #19
     3x Simon Wolf ABNER             Apr 4, 1860 #2350 - Jan-Mar 1927 St Olave Southwark, London
       + Elizabeth Sarah             1859 London - Oct-Dec 1898 St Olave Southwark, London
        4o Leah ABNER                Oct-Dec 1888 London - Jul-Sep 1979 Lambeth, London
        4o Esther ABNER              Apr-Jun 1890 London - Jan-Mar 1981 Southend on Sea, Essex
        4o Florence ABNER            Jan-Mar 1896 St Olave Bermondsey, London - after 1901
         * Bernard/Barnett STEIN
               married 1920 St Olave Southwark, London
          5x Abraham A STEIN         Jul-Sep 1921 St Olave Bermondsey, London
          5o Sophia S STEIN          Jul-Sep 1922 St Olave Bermondsey, London
          5o Sylvia STEIN            Jul-Sep 1929 St Olave Bermondsey, London
     3x Selig ABNER                  May 22, 1866 #433 - after 1929
  2x Elias ABNER                     1822 #10 - 1852 #397
  2x Salomon ABNER                   1824 #373 - 1826 #172
